masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We've got reports of fake Santas collecting 'donations' all over the city. It's not petty theftâ€”the money is funneling to a known supervillain organization. They're exploiting people's holiday generosity to fund god-knows-what. We need someone to infiltrate and trace the money."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Identify the fake charity Santas
  • Trace the money to the villain organization
  • Shut down the operation without tipping them off
